title: What College Rankings Don’t Tell You
sub_head: Students fill in important details that can’t fit in the annual lists.
body: Editor’s note: This Future View discusses the utility of college rankings. Next week we’ll ask, “How is your school responding to the pandemic? Any improvements from last semester or the same old mistakes?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Oct. 12. The best responses will be published that night.
